content: christmas feeling came to me unbelievably early this year i am playing with various yarns to make small christmas trees to hang on the actual christmas tree put under nice hot mug of tee or hot wine or send as season greeting to someone dear knitted christmas tree is versatile it is a simple knit i think it is suitable for beginners as well as it involves only knit purl knit two together stitches and you have to know how to cast-on i have put photo tutorial on my blog http //ferbyscorner blogspot com/2011/10/christmas-is-coming-to-town html thanks to miliezebomb 1 there is french version of the pattern available at her blog http //miliezebomb canalblog com/archives/2011/11/30/index html decorate knitted christmas tree as you like or even better ask your kids to do that it is a fun activity and kids will keep on asking for more christmas trees to decorate especially preschoolers 1 http //www ravelry com/people/miliezebomb
